root: ^avô Pedro: Luke still isn’t feeling better, so you’ll have to keep tending the shop.
^avô Pedro: It’s unfortunate, but I trust you’ll make the best of it...
^avô Pedro: Continue keeping an eye out for haunted or junk items, we don't want those around here!
^avô Pedro: Can you make me some cash though? The landlord’s starting to send me love letters... and I’m not sure they’re the friendly kind!
